module-reference.name: TestCoverage
module-reference.abstract: A class that uses Python's profiler to help TestModule know which functions have been called in a particular module.

module-reference.name: TestFunction
module-reference.abstract: Provides the TestFunction class for wrapping functions.

module-reference.name: TestLoader
module-reference.abstract: Provides the TestLoader class for loading test modules or packages.

module-reference.name: TestMode

module-reference.name: TestSuite
